user_prompt:

I have no clue what I want to do with the rest of my life, and that is a really big decision. I wish I could just travel the world and never look back. I paused to think of what to say, and a really bad word came to mind. Again. I don't know what to do. I'm a dork magnet. I have  zits all over my face, and the cute guy next door has yet to be seen.
